title: Studio System Hollywood Map
name: Studio System Hollywood Map
description:
A Map by Labrain

Map of Los Angeles/Hollywood during the height of the studio system in Hollywood. Features sites of old movie studios, residences, hangouts and memorable events.

properties.name: Adele Rogers St. John lived here in 1920
properties.description: Posted by Labrain

properties.name: Majestic Studios/Zoetrope
properties.description: Posted by Labrain- 1040 N. Las Palmas, Hollywood, Los Angeles, California,once owned by Howard Hughes where he made Hell\'s Angel with Jean Harlow in 1927 Originally called Jasper Studio in 1919 Metropolitan Studios in 1920s, General Services Studios in 1934, Zoetrope in 1980. Shirley Temple made film debut on stage 2; First I Love Lucy episodes made here. now called Hollywood Center Studios

properties.name: Metro Studios
properties.description: Posted by Labrain6300 Romaine, Los Angeles, CA 90028Precursor to MGM, Metro Studios started in late teens. Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse made here and large producer of pictures. In 1924 Metro merged with Goldwyn Studios to become Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. site abandoned and subsequently destroyed.

properties.name: RKO Studios

RKO Studios got the name in 1928. Howar Hughes bought it in 1948. Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz bought the studio in 1948. studio now part of Paramount
